data.name: Attach
data.value: Attempting to attach to the device for debugging...

data.name: AttachFailed
data.value: Attach failed.

data.name: AttachFailedProcessDied
data.value: Attach failed because an internal error caused the process to terminate.

data.name: CheckTarget
data.value: Verifying that the debugger target is initialized and ready for debugging.

data.name: DebuggerThreadTerminated
data.value: The debugger engine thread has terminated unexpectedly with error '{0}'.

data.name: DebuggingTargetNotFound
data.value: The debugging target could not be found.

data.name: DebuggingTargetWait
data.value: Looking for the debugging target {0} to connect to (will time out in {1} seconds)...

data.name: DeployFailed
data.value: Deployment to the device was not successful.

data.name: DeploymentErrorDeviceErrors
data.value: Deployment error: the debugging failed to initialize because of device errors.

data.name: DeploymentErrorReconnect
data.value: Deployment error: failed to (re)connect debugger engine to debugging target.

data.name: DeploySucceeded
data.value: Deployment to the device was successful.

data.name: DispatchEvents
data.value: The debugger engine is listening to debug events from the debugging target

data.name: DispatchEventsFailed
data.value: The debugger engine failed to receive any debug events from the debugging target

data.name: EmulatorCommandLine
data.value: Launching emulator with command line: '{0}'

data.name: InitializationFailed
data.value: The debugging target and the debugger engine failed to initialize because of unspecified device errors.

data.name: InitializeProcessFailed
data.value: The initialization of the debugging process failed.

data.name: InitializeProcessFailedProcessDied
data.value: The initialization of the debugging process failed because an internal error caused the process to terminate.

data.name: InvalidPort
data.value: Warning: Attempting to deploy to an invalid port {0}.

data.name: LoadAssemblies
data.value: The debugging target runtime is loading the application assemblies and starting execution.

data.name: LoadedAssembliesInformation
data.value: Updating information about assemblies on the debugging target.

data.name: Rebooting
data.value: The debugging target is not in an initialized state; rebooting...

data.name: RunningThreadsInformation
data.value: Updating thread list

data.value: Deployment of assemblies is starting.

data.name: TargetInitializeSuccess
data.value: The debugging target initialized successfully.

data.name: BogusCorDebugProcess
data.value: CorDebugProcess not properly initialized (m_pid == 0)

data.name: CouldNotReconnect
data.value: Could not reconnect to the debugging target after rebooting it.

data.name: DebugEngineAttachmentFailure
data.value: Debugger engine could not attach to debugging target.
